Setting up recurring donation. An SMS will arrive shortly requesting confirmation and providing further information.

Welcome to Alchemy, an app which will help you discover and donate to charities in Ireland. 

Tap a charity to see the donation options, and tap again to make a donation via text using your phone credit. Alchemy will prepare the text with the correct number and keyword - but you have to hit send to actually make the donation. You will get a message from the donation handling company confirming your donation was successful. 

You can long press on a charity to find see information on it.

Alchemy collects charity donation phone numbers and presents them to help you find causes that interest you. 

The charity information is sourced from https://api.likecharity.com/charities/. All donations are processed by LikeCharity, who have no association whatsoever with this app. 

Alchemy is open source and contributions are welcome (see developer website for more details). 

Currently Alchemy is restricted to use in Ireland.

Donations made through this app come out of your credit/bill. 

Alchemy does not handle any of your money - it is sent straight to the listed donation number for the charity. 

Alchemy does not collect any of your data, other than the small amount that may be collected in crash logs etc. The actual service provider (LikeCharity) may collect the text data sent to them when making a donation. 

Alchemy has no association with any of the charities, donation service providers or phone networks that handle your donation.
